summary: A woman visits her former lesbian lover who's stuck in a boring marriage. They begin an affair. The lover's husband and his best friend are also having affairs - with each other's wives. The girls decide to seduce the other wife.
cast: Eva Lyberten|Andrea Albani|Vicky Palma|Antonio Maroño|Joaquín Gómez|Jordi Vila|Lluís Torner|José Miralles|Rossy
title: La caliente niña Julietta
